body_html:
Thanks, @ispirmustafa and @AndRossi -- we are indeed currently working on this, with the intended result being that an Estimator can load from a SavedModel directory (which contains the variables and the graph binary). Note that the SavedModel is not the same as a FrozenGraph/TFLite flatbuffer, but is usually a pre-requisite for those.

We are aiming to have support in tf.contrib this quarter. Assigning to @k-w-w for now; stay tuned.

body:
Thanks, @ispirmustafa and @AndRossi -- we are indeed currently working on this, with the intended result being that an Estimator can load from a SavedModel directory (which contains the variables and the graph binary). Note that the SavedModel is not the same as a FrozenGraph/TFLite flatbuffer, but is usually a pre-requisite for those. 

We are aiming to have support in tf.contrib this quarter. Assigning to @k-w-w for now; stay tuned.
